line.originaltext: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
line.annotation: create_ing(ing224, "1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips")
create_ing(ing227, "1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced")

line.originaltext: Heat peanut oil in a wok or large skillet.
Heat peanut oil in a wok or large skillet.
When oil begins to smoke, quickly stir in 2 cloves minced garlic, ginger root, green onions and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing220, ing221, ing222, ing223, ing233}, ing234, "vegies in oil", "stir when oil is smoking")

line.originaltext: Stir fry until onion becomes translucent, about 2 minutes.
Add chicken and stir until opaque, about 3 minutes.
line.annotation: combine({ing224, ing234}, ing235, "chicken in vegies in oil", "stir until opaque (roughly 3 mins)")

line.originaltext: Add sweet onions, cabbage, bell pepper, peas and 1/2 cup of the broth/water and cover.
line.annotation: separate(ing229, ing236, "1/2 cup chicken broth", ing237, "1/2 cup chicken broth", "separate")

line.originaltext: In a small bowl, mix the remaining 1/2 cup broth/water, soy sauce, sugar and cornstarch.
line.annotation: combine({ing230, ing231, ing232, ing236}, ing238, "sauce", "in a small bowl")

line.originaltext: Add sauce mixture to wok/skillet and stir until chicken and vegetables are coated with the thickened sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing235, ing238}, ing239, "final", "stir until covered thickly")

line.originaltext: Serve immediately, over hot rice if desired.
